reviews.title: One of the best places I've stayed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed feb 27th with my mum for a treat. I had booked two single bedrooms at short notice, and the manager was extremely friendly on the phone. When we arrived I was blew away by the rooms and decor! The best part (which was the nicest service I have ever had in any hotel ive stayed in),was that the manager said as one of the single rooms was smaller than the other and we had travelled quite far, he upgraded it for free to one of the beautiful double rooms! The location is brilliant, rooms clean and the bed extremely comfortable! I stay in 4,5* hotels regularly, and this hotel is now one of my favourites.so much so, that I live 200 miles away and am now planning a trip especially so that we can stay in the hotel again!
reviews.title: Fantastic B&B

reviews.text: My husband and I had a wedding to attend in Portsmouth. Stattons were not only accommodating with early check in, but even gave us coffee and croissants when we asked if there was a nearby coffee shop (they knew we were pressed for time).
reviews.title: Perfect hotel, perfect location

reviews.text: Staff were extremeley friendly & welcoming, they even let us put our own chapagne on ice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 1 night over the bank holiday. We arrived before check-in time and got a space in the car park and our room was ready. A very informal check-in and our exec double room on the top floor was very nice. The bathroom was quite small but has everything you need - the sink was quite teeny though!
reviews.title: Lovely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided against eating out that night and went back to the hotel and had a drink at the bar (which we didn't even realise was there) and asked the manager if it would be ok to get a takeaway delivered to have in the room. It wasn't a problem at all, he brought out a selection of takeaway menus and plates and glasses for the wine we bought. A lovely touch which we really appreciated.

description: Beautiful boutique hotel with lounge bar. Free high speed internet and secure off road parking. Minutes from the seafront and a short taxi trip to Gunwharf Quays for shopping and a wide range of restaurants. SHops and restaurants in walking distance.
